title: Stage 3 Delayed — 30 Minutes
message: Due to a sound equipment issue, all Stage 3 performances will begin 30 minutes behind schedule. We apologize for the inconvenience.

title: Welcome to Bumbershoot 2026!
message: We are so excited to have you here. Check the schedule tab for today's full lineup and don't miss a thing.

title: Weather Advisory
message: Light rain is expected this evening. We recommend bringing a rain jacket or poncho. The festival will continue as scheduled.

title: The Headliner Band — Gate Opens Early
message: Gates for Climate Pledge Arena will open 45 minutes early tonight for The Headliner Band. Doors at 6:15pm.

title: New Food Vendors on the South Lawn
message: Four new food vendors have set up on the South Lawn near Fisher Pavilion. Come check out locally sourced options from 11am onwards.
